page.title: 08 Farming(2)
page.content: The farmer we interviewed works long hours on his farm,at least ten a day,with a holiday of one week per year.He enjoys his work and has been a farmer for twelve years. His farm covers 100acres with a further 145acres of rented land.It's at least 700 years old.Cows,sheep and beef cattle are kept on the farm. He told us that there have been many changes in farming over the last twenty years.With the help of modern machinery a lot of the work is much easier than before,in some ways farming has become more like industry.
